patthana8.17:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana8.17:1.1_0: Nor do they give rise to undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and they don’t give rise to diversity of phenomena.
patthana8.17:1.1_1: Nor do they give rise to defilement, and not because of defilements that gives rise to defilement.
patthana8.17:1.1_2: Nor do they arise because of defilements, but don’t inflict ...
patthana8.17:2.1_0: Nor do they arise because of defilements ...
patthana8.17:2.1_1: Nor do they arise because of defilements ...
patthana8.17:2.1_2: Not obsessed to defilement, doesn’t belong to the same teaching and training. And it doesn’t arise because of defiling influences.
patthana8.17:3.1_0: No absorption and Defilements aren’t ended. Defilements by defilements, and by lust don’t give rise to a cause.
patthana8.17:3.1_1: Nor do they arise because of defilements ...
patthana8.17:3.1_2: Not Directly knowing this, they don’t arise, or those free of defilements that arise for you and don’t stop.
patthana8.17:4.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
